name: The Great Potato Race
description:
Welcome to the Great Potato Race! You've got a plot of land and some tasty tubers, try to grow 1000 potatoes as fast as you can!

Pickup potatoes by walking over them. You can look around the map for any hiding around.
Plants are ready to harvest when they shrink slightly and turn brown.

WASD - Move around
Left Mouse - Plant Potato
Right Mouse - Harvest
Space - Jump
Escape - Options

Its a race because the game was made in only 3 days!
